Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Sure, here are the valid entities that clearly refer to "Material property" in the given paragraph, presented as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name":

The other two entities, "ratio of the donor and the acceptor" and "cathode metal", do not clearly refer to material properties and were therefore excluded from the table.
